x-terminal-emulator: x-terminal-emulator -T 'Inxi Info' -e bash -c "inxi -Fxrzm; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Hw-Probe' -e bash -c "hw-probe-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Firmware Checker' -e bash -c "firmware-checker; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Qemu Installer' -e bash -c "qemu-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Libreoffice Installer' -e bash -c "libreoffice-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Liquorix Kernel Installer' -e bash -c "liquorix-kernel-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Etcher Installer' -e bash -c "etcher-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Kernel Packages Installer' -e bash -c "kernel-apps-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Live-build Apps Installer' -e bash -c "live-build-apps-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Pipewire Installer' -e bash -c "pipewire-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Pipewire Remover' -e bash -c "pipewire-remover; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Games Installer' -e bash -c "games-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Minecraft Installer' -e bash -c "minecraft-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
